channel.title: CVE Feed for tunafish -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for tunafish -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-36705|2024-08-04T17:37:06.613Z -- tunafish -- adning%20advertising
item.description: The Adning Advertising plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the _ning_upload_image function in versions up to, and including, 1.5.5. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to upload arbitrary files on the affected sites server which may make remote code execution possible.

item.title: CVE-2020-36728|2024-08-04T17:37:06.854Z -- tunafish -- adning%20advertising
item.description: The Adning Advertising plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to file deletion via path traversal in versions up to, and including, 1.5.5. This allows unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary files which can be used to reset and gain full control of a site.
